text:
My children order 3 fishballs. I eat 1 and the fishball is NOT cooked properly(inside the fishball is cold and hard). The fishballs are NOT fresh.

I went to the owner and tell him that the fishball is NOT cooked properly and he replied me : 鱼圆不是熟的吗？ i feel its pointless to continue as the owner is not feeling apologetic. He Didnt even apologise.

Will NOT patronise the stall again.

First time eating mala tang as other coffee shop do not offer tang,

Spicyness is on point but the ma portion is lacking.
I can taste the sesame from the broth,

Tip!; Swirl near the surface, find your chance and scoop that sesame colour broth!

Tried both dry Mala & Mala soup versions and I would say it is worth the trip down to dine in! Highly recommend this mala stall if you are in Clementi/ West Coast area. 💯 affordable and delicious Mala!
Best mala ban I’ve ever eaten.. If you love the sesame kind of mala, you’ve GOT TO try this. You’ll not regret it.
One of the best Ma La In the neighbourhood. Taste is Spot On. Reasonable price.. Will return for more
